website_summaries.verdict: Hard plastic beach toys that are very sturdy and come with two carrying bags.
pros: Comes with two bags for storage, a zippered bag for long-term storage and a drawstring mesh bag for the beach
Bucket shaped like a sand castle
Mesh bag makes toys easy to rinse clean of sand
Toys do not crack or break easily
cons: The bags are not as sturdy as they could be

customer_reviews.title: then you put sand in between them all and all around and you pack it so you get a sturdy base and a big castle
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money!!! Check out the sandcastle we built! My daughter is a genius. Decide where you are gonna build your castle and then you do a square of the castle bucket. Then you fill the square in with more of the castles, then you put sand in between them all and all around and you pack it so you get a sturdy base and a big castle! Don't you love it? Highly recommend for the beach or lake!
customer_reviews.author: K. Wetherbee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I usually see similar sand toys like this being sold at stores at the beach, but they're usually twice the price. Before our trip I decided we needed to add to our collection of sand toys and figured we'd try this out. Glad we did! The plastic bag it came in was a thicker plastic than I had thought, so we were able to store all the little beach toys in there during the trip. The mesh bag it came with is a bonus! Lots of great sand accessories to keep the kids entertained. My kids ended up making lots of friends the day we had everything out - all the kids wanted to come play with everything!
customer_reviews.author: KND

customer_reviews.title: The mesh bag it comes with is quite nice. Honestly
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent purchase. I expected the toys to be much larger. Purchased for a beach trip to Ocean City, and served its purpose. Most of the toys survived three kids playing. The mesh bag it comes with is quite nice. Honestly, next time I will shop in person for items like this so I can see what I am actually purchasing. There were multiple other companies that were competitively priced, most a bit cheaper. These had the highest reviews. That's what prompted me to purchase. I am satisfied but would likely not re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with missing product
customer_reviews.text: Product seems sturdy but there seems to be discrepancies of the product. The reason I pick this out of all other competitors is because of the castle mold. The picture review from other customers show a tall mold to build castle towel, almost similar size with the bucket but mine only comes with one small castle. Disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: tracytan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value! You get quite a few beach toys plus the bag, so you can't beat the price. My biggest complaint is my mesh bag is hot pink, which is not pictured.... it's not the color I would've chosen but oh well. Otherwise, the toys seems durable enough for the price. Better quality than the dollar store, for sure. I'm looking forward to using them at the beach with my son!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Borders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 20 mo old grand daughter, it's a great set, the shapes and sizes are perfect and interesting enough even away from the beach, I was having a hard time finding a quality set with a bucket just the right size for a small toddler, this one's perfect. bright colors and really high quality weight and finish on the pieces. She played with them today in the house and on the patio, if we're lucky we'll hit the beach one more time before winter sets in. Highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L Dellarosa

customer_reviews.title: Great Sand Toys for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We have many sand toys that we have accumulated over the years but none that are appropriate for an 18 month little girl. These sand toys are the perfect size for tiny toddler hands. She can handle all of the toys in this set with minimal help. Our granddaughter is particularly enjoying the watering can. The set is exactly as pictured, just be aware that the toys are small. I would recommend for up to 3 years old. After that you might be looking for something a little bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: The items came nicely packed in a plastic carry bag with a separate mesh bag inside. I like that since i can use the mesh bag for the actual beach and the plastic one for storage. The shipping was quick and items weren't damaged. The pieces are varied and cute. I'm sure my 3 year old will enjoy very much. She has already started stacking and playing with the pieces at home. She enjoys the bright colors. Great quality for the price. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beach toy set with nice moulds that keep the kids occupied.
customer_reviews.author: YamYam

customer_reviews.title: Ours boys loved these toys and had a great time playing with ...
customer_reviews.text: Ours boys loved these toys and had a great time playing with them The bag is extremely convenient and the handles make it easy to tote around
customer_reviews.author: SannyCS

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the last minute for a weekend at the beach with my 4 y.o. grad daughter I surprised her before we left for the weekend and she was ecstatic! The toys are shipped inside a mesh backpack and that was very convenient for trans porting them and for packing them up after each day at the beach. We made sand molds for hours and carried water from the lake to our 'work' spot on the beach. She skipped and sang the entire weekend and told me I was the beast Poppy ever. The toys appear to be quite rugged and I expect them to endure the abuse of my grand daughter for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: B Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is for my granddaughter and she was so excited to receive these, she absolutely loves them. Haven’t had a chance to go to the beach yet but she plays with them anyway. She loves all the sea shape creatures. The handle wouldn’t stay attached to the pail so I just hooked it to the second hole and it’s perfect! WE LOVE THIS can’t wait to go play at the ocean which should be in 1week. And this came the very next day!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. The lid for the bucket was broken when we opened it. I’m not surprised. The plastic is very cheaply made and probably won’t last more than a day at the beach. Save your money and invest in a nicer set of you want it to last more that one day.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Garner

customer_reviews.title: The perfect beach kit!
customer_reviews.text: This set is just perfect for our toddler! The mesh bag is essential to keep all the items together and also makes transporting to and from the beach a breeze! It really is everything you need for fun in the sand. The perfect set!
customer_reviews.author: Chante

customer_reviews.title: Used beach toys
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, but I am giving it two stars because the package I received was used. There was hair and dirt sand in the animals. Due to the fact that my little one just got her sand box. I just let them sit out in the sun and wiped them off. Could have been sanitized before being sent to another customer.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Reinforce the mesh bag and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.text: After writing my original review stating some pieces broke quickly (the mesh bag and large bucket) the company contacted me and sent a new set of sand toys! If you have a sewing machine I highly recommend reinforcing the stitching on the mesh bag. I love that the mesh bag allows you to rinse out the sand toys while in the bag but the seams need some extra reinforcement. My kids love the sand molds and they are some of the better sand molds they've used. Most of the toys fit in the large castle bucket which makes packing things up and storing them much easier.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Use once and toss
customer_reviews.text: These are very flimsy. The larger bucket and spades broke after 2-3 hours of play. Thankfully the kids had enough pieces to play for 2-3 days. We threw the entire set away before we came home.
customer_reviews.author: H B P

customer_reviews.title: Save your Money....Try a different Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these molds and sand toys for our trip last week. I figured it was cheap and had a lot of options. Well I got what I paid for, a shovel and rake broke in half, the bucket had a crack and could barely get water to the spot we were at, and the little carry bag broke by the time we got from the room to the beach. Later that evening we ran to the local Walmart, and found they had better sand toys and more age appropriate for my kids (4 and 8) at a reasonable price. So if you are headed to the beach save your money and try the local Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Sand Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. My son was playing with it on the beach and all of a sudden, I look up, and there were six children playing with my son. The toys were so cool that half of the beach came over to play too. My mom was amazed. It was so cool! Get this set and your children (plus everyone else's) will be happy - and mom was happy too because clean up was super easy with the mesh beach bag that was enclosed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: cute sandbox toys
customer_reviews.text: its a cute little set for kids. of course its made of plastic so it is easily breakable when the kids are hard on it and throwing it around but if played with like its meant to i dont see a problem with it. color and items are exactly as pictured comes in a net bag
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The colors were bright and beautiful and my kids loved all the sand castle type pieces. My dislike was the watering bucket was a bit small like meany for a 2yr old and same with the rake. otherwise it was a great product for the money and came with everything where other sets did not.
customer_reviews.author: CK Foxxy

customer_reviews.title: Good beach set - lots of pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! Lots of molds, two shovels, two sifters, a rake, and a watering can! Should last us years to come since our son is only 15 months! The only issue was that the bottom of the bucket has a very sharp piece (from the plastic mold) that we had to cut and cover.
customer_reviews.author: A. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for that sandcastle
customer_reviews.text: This is a very complete set of sand toys. My 18 mo old son immediately loved them and carried the little sand shovel everywhere! This comes with everything you need to make an impressive sand castle and after several trips to the beach nothing has broken! I love the included mesh bag- makes the clean up process a little better and easier to not bring all the sand home with us. Great deal for the price, not flimsy like other sets at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ward

customer_reviews.title: bag breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: my daughter absolutely loved this set. the bag was the best part cause she could wear it on our walk to the beach. the toys themselves are great and still are. but the straps on the bag broke immediately on our 10minute walk the very first day of our beach trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu

customer_reviews.title: Waaaay too small
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how TINY everything is. You can get a much bigger bucket with toys at Walmart for same price if not less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft plastic cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: This sets come with bunch of them however quality is at lower end. You would expect soft plastic and those were easy to break. Also depends on the sand, it only works with soft sand not mixing with rocks of any sort. Guess you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Waston

customer_reviews.title: Great sand toys! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved these sand toys! We took them to the beach and they had a blast playing with them. Colorful, durable, and sturdy, and they come in a cute net bag you can shake the sand out of. They were delivered on time too! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MySharona

customer_reviews.title: Used it on a cruise
customer_reviews.text: This little bucket followed us to Jamaica and Mexico on a cruise. The kids loved playing in the sand while I was enjoying some swimming. This toy set was also popular with the other kids in the area who all came to join my daughters and play.
customer_reviews.author: Eve L.

customer_reviews.title: Niece Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 4 year old niece. She loves it. She's had one day at the beach to play with it. She loves all the pieces and is quickly figuring out what they are all good for. I was good for a couple hours of play. Comes in very cute draw-string backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rick at Skiboater

customer_reviews.title: More than half of toys arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: They're okay. They're pretty flimsy for the money and more than half were cracked or broken. Luckily my daughter is young and was amused by the bucket and shovel during the excursion. They won't last too long though.
customer_reviews.author: celxt8

customer_reviews.title: Comes with mesh bag and plastic bag
customer_reviews.text: Comes with mesh bag and plastic bag, which has been great for both the beach and traveling in our car if we don't want sand all over and need the plastic bag! Super durable toys!! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Loved the variety
customer_reviews.text: Lots of variety. Great size for a one year old
customer_reviews.author: raquel beayon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! It’s quite a large set and the bag is super helpful for cleanup. The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that we did have one piece break on its first use. Other than that, great overall!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson has been asking for a sand bucket and shovel. I purchased this one as it has many molds and cake in a bag. He loves it!!! He pulls out each mold naming them. Now to get back to the beach so we can build some sand creatures.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa V E

customer_reviews.title: VERY sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the beach for my almost 5 year old. I was very happy with how sturdy the shovels and molds were! I knew my kid was not going to get frustrated playing with this for hours in the sand. BEST sand castle set I've purchased so far, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hizam

customer_reviews.title: Nice BEACH SAND SET
customer_reviews.text: The Prextex Beach Toy Set is awesome. I do childcare and the kids just love them! They are durable and have molds like a dinosaur,etc. that you don't always find in a beach set, the kids love that! You won't go wrong buying this set. I loved all the different colors and the set is definitely worth the money🙂
customer_reviews.author: Smilyred

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets of these great little toys for the beach and they are fabulous! Super sturdy plastic, not the cheap stuff at the local stores, a great mesh carrying bag that made it easy to collect and knock off sand to carry back, and plenty of variety of toys for both of my kids. I have two boys and one ended up with a pink mesh bag but he didn't really care. I'd definitely recommend these to anyone with kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, can't find a better deal anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Esp. during this quarantine. Just got get your babirs a couple of the $3 bags of sand from Walmart or home Depot And get you set of these buckets they will be set for the whole summer. My kids (2&5) haven't stopped playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Burford

customer_reviews.title: Great set for children
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my 4 year old nephew and 11 year old niece for our vacation at the beach. They both loved to play with them on the sands, especially love the animals and the castle.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute mold set for the beach or sandbox. A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter received a sandbox and this pack of toys from us for her birthday. She loves it....so we're all happy. Its a cute set!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Castro

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and a variety of moulds
customer_reviews.text: 2 years old daughter loves it. Very colorful and contains a lot of moulds which it a pretty good time killer when partnering with sand during sip.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Came as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Came as pictured. Lots of variety of sand toys. We bought this for a sand table and is the perfect amount of toys for it. Also perfect if you were to take them to a beach or water park. Only gave 4 stars because the mesh bag that comes with the toys is cheap material and probably won’t hold up. But that can easily be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Size Buckle and Quality Shovels, but Castle Molding is Very Small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased due to the fact that one reviewer posted some large sand castle moldings, but this does not come with it. It only comes with what is pictured and the castle molding that comes with it is around 2 inch high which is Very Small good for kids ages 3 and under. The plastic shovels and other toys are sturdy but i can see the buckle not lasting more than a season. Better off going to BJ's if you have membership and buying a 24 piece they have for 13.00...
customer_reviews.author: HMM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and they all fit in the bag!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and them and no matter how you put them back in the bag they all fit! Bucket first of course. Can’t wait to hit the beach and try them out. Great variety of shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Mardi Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my niece, who just got a new sandbox. The cute variety of sand toys were a hit! I also loved that the mesh bag is like a backpack, easy for taking them to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who like blocks and building1
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the beach, but my 4 year old grandson found them and claimed them. I had to sneak them back so we would have some beach toys. I have no doubt they will be a hit in the real sand. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ronda S. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for her first trip to the beach. She absolutely loved it. Sturdy items and held up well at the beach. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Beach fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very well made. Delivered on time and perfectly described. Grandkids will have a blast at the beach this year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denis M. Dusssault

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of sand toys
customer_reviews.text: Nice beach toys for the kiddos. We will see how strong they are vs a 3yr old this weekend. Comes in a backpack style sack .
customer_reviews.author: Victor E.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are loving these... especially the mini watering can! If I could buy 3 more mini watering cans for the other kids. I would in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: Radkins23

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but not bad.
customer_reviews.text: These would have been five stars if the sand would have come out of the big castle shape. All other pieces were great. I would consider recommending these.
customer_reviews.author: gypsykl79

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last thru day 1 of a 4 day trip to the beach. First the pros: Bright colors, lots of molds - my 2 year old was impressed with the visual, there is a plastic bag & mesh bag to hold toys. We used the mesh bag to carry other items. The cons: cheap plastic. once she tried to use the shovel it broke. Next time I will purchase a toy shovel from Alvin's across from the beach.
customer_reviews.author: TXMommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys for beach
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used these myself. They were bought for my little granddaughter who is going on her first beach vacation. Very nice set tho.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: The products were well made, and I loved that it came with a mesh bag. It was small and light enough for my 4 year old to carry himself. It had just enough items in it to keep him content and occupied at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: This set is very tiny, much smaller than anticipated. Other than the size it is a cute little beach set.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two princess's

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our grandson new sandbox. Very colourful and sturdy. Storage bag included.
customer_reviews.author: Lynroy81

customer_reviews.title: My kids like it !
customer_reviews.text: Cute set ...will keep your kids engaged...there so many things in this set ( starfish, seahorse, carb, dinosaur, octopus, fish, a tiny castle which I wish was a little bigger, shell etc)..
customer_reviews.author: Sweta S

customer_reviews.title: Great beach toys
customer_reviews.text: Great beach toys. We had never been to the beach before and we really wanted something for our kids to use. These were great, we threw them in the car and they were light and well made. Our ten year old had a blast making tons of castles. I would recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my great nephew. He loved it as does his brother & sister. Good quality, quick service, and a storage bag included. Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: T Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Not the most sturdy, but fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: Some of the shovels broke and bent at the beach. The variety of toys was nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner. Looks like grandchildren will have lots of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to have before they visited us in Florida. The quality is good, and the variety of toys is good.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that it wasn't cheap feeling. From the packaging it's in to the toys were all great! I know a 2 yr old who will be very excited to use these with his new sand box!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope G

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Truly disappointed in the quality of these plastic toys. The toys are thin and brittle feeling. The strap handle on the bucket had a sharp edge that will likely cut a child. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. She loved being able to put them in the little bag and putting the bag on her back. They will be coming back to the beach with us this year.
customer_reviews.author: kayak freshman

customer_reviews.title: Unique shapes
customer_reviews.text: Love this beach toy set! We haven't taken it to the beach yet, but I love that it has two shovels, a big yellow pail, a sand sorting thing, and different shaped sand shape things (alligator, bunny, Taj Mahal). It's so unique and cute!
customer_reviews.author: jenk

customer_reviews.title: Nice sand toys
customer_reviews.text: These sand toys are well made and delivered as promised. My grandson loves them. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ms LR

customer_reviews.title: Toys are ok.  Mesh bag didn't last...
customer_reviews.text: The toys are pretty standard. The mesh bag, which is one of the reasons I bought this particular one, did not survive our first beach outing. UPDATE: The seller reached out to me after my review and replaced the torn mesh bag. Because they stand behind their product and fixed the issue, I've added another star. Its always a good sign when customer service steps up instead of just taking your money.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: she loved it
customer_reviews.text: has enough parts and pieces to keep a 2 year old happy on Castaway Cay
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Three Year Old Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, sturdy construction, great variety of shapes. Being unable to take the kids to the beach during this pandemic, a little kinetic sand on a sheet and these tools make for hours of fun....my three year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Betti D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter absolutely loved the sand toys. She loved wearing them as a back pack when we were headed down to the beach. The toys were cute and a good quality...my only complaint is that on the 2nd day at the beach the shoulder strap on the backpack broke, It ripped into.
customer_reviews.author: Gina L

customer_reviews.title: nice inexpensive gift idea
customer_reviews.text: for granddaughter at the beach. she plays with these toys by the hour
customer_reviews.author: DLS2015

customer_reviews.title: Sand toys
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces are very cute; but the rake broke the first day it was used at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Kobrin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sand play time.
customer_reviews.text: Great set - very happy with this one. Took it to Destin for my 2 1/2 year old and it provided hours of entertainment. Love the mesh carrying bag!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hills

customer_reviews.title: Nice for sandbox or beach.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a five yr old and has had lots of play time with it. Nice sturdy plastic bag and includes a mesh bag for beach
customer_reviews.author: Bk50

customer_reviews.title: Cool beach toy
customer_reviews.text: There is a lovely variety of what you can create with the items included inside! I love it and my daughter keeps on playing with it whenever we go to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Deejay

customer_reviews.title: We're off to the beach!
customer_reviews.text: These are brightly colored tools for the beach. Iknow my 7yr old loves them already. And the 17 year old was excited about the shovels! Thank you for providing well crafted items.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a beautiful set of toys the kids enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these beach toys for my granddaughter, who is 2 years old. We live in a landlocked state, so we have no beach. But, she will enjoy these toys in her new sandbox. I think they will be perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: These came in wonderful vibrant colors and just the right size for little hands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my grandchildren. Their ages range from 3 to 5. I was very happy with the number of different molds, pail and shovel and other numerous toys that came with the set. The backpack bag is great to put all the toys in when they are done playing with them. I definitely would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beach and sand toys
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for a great price. Just enough buckets, scoops, shapes etc. My 18 month and 3 1/2 yearove them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cool molds and accessories! Loved that there was more than 1 shovel, so I can scoop and so could my little guy. Comes in a really great reusable bag too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: The additional net bag is what sets this product apart from other similar products. Great bag! Shovel and rake are large! Kids love them! Nice variety of items!
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: Good for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for my older child to play with
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed Son
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son on his 4th birthday. Opened the bag in the car on the way to the beach only to discover the ONLY bucket in the bag was cracked and other toys as well. With whatever toys that werent broken, the kids played...but I will say they felt very..very..cheap n chinsey
customer_reviews.author: Doug Tramontana

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These were the absolute perfect set of beach toys for our five year old. They were the perfect size for her and had a lot of variety of molds and toys. And I especially loved the net bag to carry them all in.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Must have beach accessory
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. My daughter and her cousins loved everything in the kit. Both the mesh bag and the plastic carrying bag were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Colby A.

customer_reviews.title: Great packing
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a present and the boys loved it
customer_reviews.author: Letif Letif West

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyyy overpriced and wayyyy cheap. Received ours and they were cracked and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Powellfamily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toys !
customer_reviews.text: These toys were perfect for my two boys (2 and 4). It was their first time to the beach and they were just what we needed !
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Cute set but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute set, but the bucket arrived cracked. The kids were super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect! Everything you need to make the best sand castle ever according to my grandson. Also, a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Peejay

customer_reviews.title: Okay toddler set.
customer_reviews.text: its okay, nothing spectacular, kids just used the castle mainly as a bucket and didn't really use anything else. was hoping it would be a hit, maybe next time.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was easier to fit all inside the box
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Hani Taibah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my niece and she absolutely loved it she even plays with it at home :)
customer_reviews.author: Gold

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with everything has to be red so when we received this I was a little disappointed that the large bucket was green instead. Color aside it is made well and not to flimsy. We have already made several sand kingdoms as my kids like to call them and this set fits right in with all their other sand toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great beach toy.
customer_reviews.text: This sand toy was a big hit with my son and his 3 year-old son at their first beach vacation - they made some really great castles. Having the carry bag was so handy. I recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Nanc

customer_reviews.title: Everything for a day at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after moving near the Oregon coast. So many different shapes and tools for my kids to make a sandy mess! The items are not too thin where they break by picked my up sand. The mesh carrying case is very helpful. Have only had them about a year, but definitely looking forward to another beach season with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My child loves playing with these toys and so do I! They seem sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro V

customer_reviews.title: My kids cant wait
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the kids to enjoy at the beach this weekend. Will update with pics and more info afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Randy

product_meta.title: Prextex 19 Piece Beach Toys Sand Toys Set, Bucket with Sifter, Shovels, Rakes, Watering Can, Animal and Castle Molds in Drawstring Bag
feature_bullets: 1 Bucket with Easy to Carry Handle, with 1 additional Ancient Castle Mold
12 fun Animal Molds Star fish, Crocodile, Turtle, Bunny, Dinosaur, octopus, horse fish, shellfish, lobster, and a Castle wall
Also included: Sand Sifter, Watering Can, Rake and 2 Shovels with Sifter Shovel for Hours of Fun at the Beach
Reusable Drawstring Mesh Bag So Can be Easily Rinsed for Easy Store and Travel
Perfect beach set for your upcoming beach or pool party. (colors may vary)
